name: Blue Cyber - Episode 01
description:
EPISODE 01

Decades ago the Locusts began spreading across the galaxy. They brought death and destruction to every world they invaded. A magic spell was cast to imprison all life outside of the planet of Cobalt in stone. This was a last desperate attempt to slow the Locust threat. The spell is only temporary. The Locusts will soon return.

You are the new Delegate. The Vault Keeper entrusts you with the magic of the Blue Cyber and sends you on quest to find a way to defeat the Locusts.

Controls:

  • Click and drag to rotate camera
  • Click on characters and objects to interact with the scene
